name: Cooper's Shadows
description:
Today the shed got sprayed for spiders. Cooper had a thought - What if the spiders just left the shed and came into the house, or worse: What if they came for his bunnies!

Cooper's 3 bunnies, Pippin, Hiedi and Bunbun follow him around everywhere. He became worried that the spiders would get them. We consoled him, we told him that's one of the reasons why we were spraying the shed to begin with.

He was still worried.

That night, after a huge gaming session on his PC, Cooper fell into a deep sleep. He started dreaming about his bunnies, the spiders, his PC, the lot! This game is Cooper's dream about protecting his 3 loves, the bunnies that are Cooper's Shadows.
